Koo::Rpc::Rpc::PyroConnection Class Reference

The PyroConnection class implements Connection for the Pyro RPC protocol. More...

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The PyroConnection class implements Connection for the Pyro RPC protocol.

The Pyro protocol is usually opened at port 8071 on the server.
